column1: Smoque BBQ////Really good food.  We brought some friends from Germany recently
column3: as did we.  The meat was fantastic
column4: especially the brisket and pulled pork.  This being my first time
column5: I didn't know it was BYOB
column6: so be advised if you're expecting a bar.  They're organized such that you order at the counter and then get your table - this is probably the best way to get everyone through most efficiently.  DELICIOUS.
